attributes.action: Make Established Relationships Living Apart Exempt From COVID Rules.
attributes.additional_details: During this important fight with COVID-19 relationships are struggling due to the rules. Not everyone is in the position to move in with their partner or have their partner in their support bubble. By making established relationships exempt to COVID-19 you are giving people the chance to continue growing their relationships without the stress of not knowing when they’re going to be able to spend time together properly and the anxiety that comes with that. Give relationships a fair chance.
attributes.background: Give people who are living apart a chance by making relationships exempt to the COVID-19 rules.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554780
